mapper.insert: INSERT INTO route_definition ( route_definition_id, route_id, route_uri, route_predicates, route_filters, route_order, route_state ) VALUES ( #{routeDefinitionId}, #{routeId}, #{routeUri}, #{routePredicates}, #{routeFilters}, #{routeOrder}, #{routeState} )
mapper.update: UPDATE route_definition SET route_id = #{routeId}, route_uri = #{routeUri}, route_predicates = #{routePredicates}, route_filters = #{routeFilters}, route_order = #{routeOrder}, route_state = #{routeState} WHERE route_definition_id = #{routeDefinitionId}
mapper.select: SELECT route_definition_id, route_id, route_uri, route_predicates, route_filters, route_order, route_state FROM route_definition WHERE route_delete = '0' ORDER BY update_time desc
SELECT route_definition_id, route_id, route_uri, route_predicates, route_filters, route_order, route_state FROM route_definition WHERE route_id = #{routeId} AND route_delete = '0'
SELECT route_definition_id, route_id, route_uri, route_predicates, route_filters, route_order, route_state FROM route_definition WHERE route_definition_id = #{routeDefinitionId}
